content: Really wonderful share needed so badly in our society today. THANK YOU! I’m an entrepreneur who gets asked ALL the time how I will give up my work (which I love) so I can have a family! EEWWW, why do they think it’s my only option? Why can’t I “do” family like I’ve done everything else in my life: with zeal and positivity refusing to get into a box made by others, instead building my own life to fulfill the joy. Your words rang true to me and I’m so grateful. Thank you for you sharing your heart and being a voice for me and so many others!
